Title: Shelter From the Storm 1:1-2
Plot: Declan gets a new assignment from the FBI.  Eileen is in for a shock when she becomes a volunteer at social services.  Tommy is feeling pressure to become Judd's replacement as chairman of a committee.  Michael and Collin enter a partnership with Nozzoli.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
